products.title: Verona Prime 25mm Gloss Bright White Perfect Fit Venetian Blind
products.description: Their range of verona 25mm perfect fit aluminium venetian blinds blend simplicity with functionality, and are perfect for the office - home or away. A bright shade, this gloss bright white perfect fit venetian blind adds an refreshing look to your home. Match with other grey tones for a modern style, or mix with wood accessories for a chic finished look. Perfect fit blinds are designed for use with a upvc door and window as they are drill, and screw-free.

products.title: Zambezi 25mm Polar White Real Wood Perfect Fit Blind
products.description: A fresh white shade, this zambezi polar white perfect fit blind is practical and oh-so stylish. White shades create a fresh look, and a neutral base allowing you to creatively accessories the room. Using and easy clip-on fitting system, this perfect fit wooden blind is both drill and screw-free, and provides a child-safe option for your upvc windows or doors. At swift direct blinds quality is important to us, which is why your new perfect fit blind is hand-made with quality materials, in their yorkshire workshop by their team of experts, and delivered direct to your door.

products.title: Cellular Warm White Thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Cellular pleated blinds are given their namesake because their 'celluar shade' is made of layers bonded together to creae honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit heat transfer from the window. These pockets create the attractive pleating effect on the front and slow down the heat loss in your room. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds, celluar pleated blinds are effective at keeping your house warm during the winter and cool during the summer.

products.title: Metis Solar White Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Metis solar pleated fabric is available in a wide range of colours and features a silver solar speckled backing. Fantastic for conservatories, hot rooms like offices or even rooms with south-facing windows. This soft white blind offers just the right amount of solar protection without sacrificing any natural light. White creates a clean and crisp look, favoured for being the easiest colour to work with when designing a room.

products.title: Rio Blackout Solar Vanilla Neat Fit Honeycomb Pleated Blind
products.description: Rio blackout solar is a honeycomb blackout pleated fabric, available in a wide range of tropical colours with an added bonus of a solar silver backing to block harmful uv rays. This soft almost magnolia cream shade, can be paired with any coloured accessories for a summery vibe, or cream walls for a warmer feel. Raio vanilla is a great addition to a kitchen or conervatory with plants to help dress the room.
